text: I love this place. I feel very welcome as soon as you enter! The sushi is always sooo tasty, I highly recommend this spot

Amazing high quality sushi, made to order by a charming and skilled chef. 

The menu is deep and slowly changing as he tries new things. I am excited to see what he has in store for us in the future. 

Awesome value and neat touches to his food like blowtorch sushi.
Exceptional sushi. My favourite in Toronto. The chef was super friendly and professional. The fish was exceptionally fresh.
The owner is so sweet and highly qualified. I believe he used to be the sushi chef at the Shangri La
High quality.  Fresh and delicious.  Looking forward to returning. Recommend the tuna avocado salad.
Fantastic omakase!!! Coming from Vancouver, we know our sushi. This place is amazing. Also, the chef apprenticed for Jiro!!!

Tried this new place on Roncesvalle and was pleasantly surprised! Very fresh sushi, and I believe even torched for the lunch combo which is an amazing deal given the price point. Only downside is that it's cash and debit only, like many restaurants in this area.  I have returned several times since then. Definitely recommend!

A new spot in town- megumi is a fast favourite. The owner was great and made some wonderful recommendations. Everything we had was fresh and delicious and made super fast!

We'll definitely be back for more.
I got the Dynamite Salmon and it was so big and delicious! I'm so happy I live nearby, this is my new go-to place for take out now
